item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "If the road is easy, you're likely going the wrong way." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Deepak Chopra
item.description: "I was very afraid at the beginning, until Master told me that pain isn't the truth; it's what you have to get through in order to find the truth." -- Deepak Chopra

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Matthew Good
item.description: "Personal perception of perfection is like that. You see what you want to see. After awhile you just see what you need to." -- Matthew Good

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "If cats looked like frogs we'd realize what nasty, cruel little bastards they are. Style. That's what people remember." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "The last thing I ever wanted was to be alive when the three most powerful people on the whole planet would be named Bush, Dick and Colon." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I'm killing time while I wait for life to shower me with meaning and happiness." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "People think it must be fun to be a super genius, but they don't realize how hard it is to put up with all the idiots in the world." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "What's another word for thesaurus?" -- Steven Wright

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Ellen DeGeneres
item.description: "I ask people why they have deer heads on their walls. They always say because it's such a beautiful animal. There you go. I think my mother is attractive, but I have photographs of her." -- Ellen DeGeneres

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "She would of been a good woman," said The Misfit, "if it had been somebody there to shoot her every minute of her life." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Bacaff2 add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy
